itunes:title: #156: It Gets Better...
title: #156: It Gets Better...
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
description:
In this episode, we want to normalize that, even though the healing process can be difficult at first, it does get better and evens out.

We hope breaking down what happens and what to expect helps you know that the light is coming soon.
